desc: Relieve your dry eyes naturally with Ziena Eyewear. The silicone eyecup blocks wind, pollen, dust, & other airborne eye irritants. Ziena has proven results against ailments such as chronic dry eyes, Sjogren Syndrome, Ocular Rosacea, Bell’s Palsy, Allergies, Stevens-Johnson syndrome, Post-LASIK, and Keratoconjunctivitis

layout.text: Ziena eyewear keeps eyes protected from wind, allergens, germs & more.
